title: Mark Palm from Supercrush, Devotion and Go It Alone
itunes:title: Mark Palm from Supercrush, Devotion and Go It Alone
description:
Episode 185 - Mark Palm is on the show this week and he has played in many bands including the seminal hardcore band Go It Alone as well as metal/thrash heroes Black Breath while also traveling the world on his own. He currently plays in a band called Supercrush while also still pursuing his solo project called Devotion. He's an incredibly interesting person and we dive deep into what the life of a wanderer is like, defying conventions and always pushing yourself. - - -This weeks show is brought to you by Zevia, the zero calorie, naturally sweetened soda. Sign up here for a free six pack!Follow the show on Twitter

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
